ns0:Request.ns0:SQLCommand: SELECT c.Id ContactId, apl.Id ApplicantId, c.Birthdate, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.MiddleName, c.Suffix, c.Phone, c.MobilePhone, c.Work_Phone__c, c.MailingStreet, c.MailingCity, c.MailingState, c.MailingPostalCode FROM Contact c INNER JOIN Applicant__c apl ON c.Id=apl.Contact__c WHERE apl.Application__c=@ApplicationId
